hacker.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who secretly uses or changes the information in other people’s computer systems
hacker.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: A hacker had managed to get into the system.
hacker.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who secretly reaches information on someone else’s computer system so that they can look at, use, or change it
hacker.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Intercepting messages on the Internet is easy for a smart hacker.
